definition: to blend into/to integrate/to assimilate/to merge
to melt/to thaw/to blend/to merge/to be in harmony
to enter/to go into/to join/to become a member of/to confirm or agree with/abbr. for 入聲|入声[ru4 sheng1]

sentences.english: Getting it to civilization is another.
sentences.chinese: 讓它融入現代文明是另一方面。

sentences.english: High performing teams do an excellent job of "on-boarding" the new team member(s).
sentences.chinese: 高績效團隊在幫助新人融入方面也做得很出色。

sentences.english: Content Analysis Study on Character Education in Textbooks of Learning Area of Integrated …
sentences.chinese: 臺灣國民小學中年級綜合活動領域教科書融入品德。

sentences.english: The boys suffered loneliness, homesickness, "Pommy bashing" and culture shock.
sentences.chinese: 他們不能融入當地社會，還遭遇文化衝突。

sentences.english: The huts darkled away into the gloom of the field.
sentences.chinese: 那些茅舍逐漸變模糊，融入了一片蒼茫的原野中。

sentences.english: a. The economy of China will merge into the tide of the world economy. b. The economy of China will converge with that of the world economy.
sentences.chinese: 中國的經濟將融入世界經濟的大潮。

sentences.english: Painters were hired to try and blend the huge, obtrusive towers into the landscape.
sentences.chinese: 受僱的畫家嘗試着將突兀的巨塔融入周圍的風景之中。

sentences.english: This, and only by this, can the Dharma truly infuse our minds.
sentences.chinese: 只有這樣，才能使正法真正融入自相續。

sentences.english: It's a chance for Poland to be in the mainstream of the EU, and to be engaged in global affairs, " Balcer noted."
sentences.chinese: 這是波蘭融入歐盟主流，參與全球事務的一個機會。

sentences.english: It is successfully integrated into the Park, making various references to the surrounding city.
sentences.chinese: 它成功地融入公園，與周邊城市形成各種參照。

sentences.english: The former Atletico Madrid keeper is wasting little time becoming integrated at United and adapting to his new surroundings.
sentences.chinese: 前馬競門將正在嘗試融入球隊，並與新隊友配合。

sentences.english: With his friendly manners and loyalty he perfectly fitted into our team.
sentences.chinese: 他的友善和忠誠使他很好地融入了我們的團隊。

sentences.english: There are much knowledge on law and commerce in his works.
sentences.chinese: 海巖作品中融入了豐富的法律知識和商業知識。

sentences.english: Clason offers personal finance wisdom in the form of parables.
sentences.chinese: Clason將個人理財智慧融入寓言之中。

sentences.english: New stars have joined the club, but the group became well-oiled.
sentences.chinese: 新的球星融入了球隊，但是球隊之間的磨合很好。

sentences.english: The building unfurls and is folded into the railroad landscape and composite urban fabric.
sentences.chinese: 建築在鐵路景觀與綜合城市肌理中展開，並融入其中。

definition: a mixture/an amalgam/fusion/welding together/to be in harmony with (nature)/to harmonize with/to fit in
(lit. and fig.) to permeate/to seep into/(of a product, idea etc) to penetrate (in a population)/(of hostile forces) to infiltrate/(chemistry) osmosis
to draw into/to pull into/to introduce
mix together/put together (usu. things that do not blend well together)
to run through/a connecting thread from beginning to end/to link
to come out/to emerge/to reveal/to display
to create/to build/to develop/to forge (of metal)
